name: Racing Car:Ex Lava Water
description:
Racing Car:Ex Lava Water is new game, in which you have to tap the race button and your driving journey has been started. Use brakes to reduce speed and clear rotating hurdles without crash. Experience the driving car on volcano flames scenario over amazing lava filled tracks. Car racing in fire path territory is not easy challenge because only you can handle. You can drive the car by performing stunts in lava hills. Prepare for a supernatural, ambient journey through lava games. Car racing in lava with realistic fire flame hurdles and crashes.
Features:
- Various car selection
- Red hot lava
- Perform stunts on different jumping hurdles
- Lava balls, car crashes
- Simple tap and easy to play
- Easy controls
